articles.title: JUICE in Trouble // Sun-Like Star Devours a Planet // Artificial Gravity Space Station - Fraser Cain
articles.description: JUICE is having problems extending its radar antenna. Astronomers watch a star eat its planet. A design for a space station with artificial gravity. 🦄 Suppo...

articles.author: Tom Ivan
articles.title: Hogwarts Legacy gets an arachnophobia mode and 500 fixes as it hits PS4 and Xbox One - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: The title’s first update in two months is a big one…
articles.content:
A new Hogwarts Legacy patch has added an arachnophobia mode to the game as well as over 500 fixes.
Available in the games accessibility options, the arachnophobia mode makes spiders less intimidatin… [+1106 chars]
